backend/main.mo: IC canister actor managing Stripe configuration, access control, and checkout/session status calls using mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing pricing‑copy update requirements and affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend React files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and global styles including light/dark palettes and utility overrides.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry file with metadata and html2pdf.js loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router setup defining all routes and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, branding, and brief GST Invoice Pro description.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePreview.t: Renders invoice preview with GST calculations and supports PDF export via html2pdf.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and page outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that creates a checkout session using the backend actor and returns session details.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark mode and custom Indian color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/gst.ts: Calculates GST totals, subtotals, tax percentages, and interstate status from invoice data.
frontend/src/lib/states.ts: Exports a list of all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's dashboard with subscription status, stats, and recent invoices.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceCreator.tsx: Provides a form interface to build GST invoices, manage items, upload a logo, and preview the invoice.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature cards, and CTA buttons for creating invoices or viewing pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message with reasons and navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows payment success confirmation and links to the dashboard or invoice creation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders free and paid plan pricing, lists features, and triggers checkout session creation for upgrades.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining pricing‑related feature updates and current app state.
